survey_brief: This survey aims to assess student satisfaction with various aspects of university life, including academic support, campus facilities, and extracurricular opportunities.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of academic instruction in your major?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled to avoid confusion.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of academic instruction in your major?

questions.question_text: Which of the following campus facilities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture comprehensive facility usage patterns.

script.question_text: Which of the following campus facilities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university's academic advising services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university's academic advising services?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in extracurricular activities offered by the university?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure engagement levels. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in extracurricular activities offered by the university?

questions.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction level with your university experience so far?
questions.client_notes: This question serves as a summary metric. Place it near the end of the survey for best results.

script.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction level with your university experience so far?
